transArray.content: The hotel room was very clean, and the most important thing was that it did not have any peculiar smell. I originally only booked it for one night, but because the situation was very good in all aspects, I extended my stay for one more night, from May 9 to May 11, 2023. The service was very good and we were upgraded to a larger room for free. Definitely recommend staying here, you won't be disappointed.

Dear guest, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel. We will continue to work hard to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel. We look forward to visiting you again. I wish you a pleasant journey.
